pages.text: $(thing)Skill cycling$() is a function in $(aoa) that allows you to 'reset' your $(thing)skill$()'s progress to level 1, in exchange for a sizeable xp boost for future gains.
pages.title: Skill Cycling

pages.text: When you reach level 100 in a $(thing)skill$(), you unlock the ability to '$(thing)cycle$()' that skill.$(br)Doing so reverts your current xp to 0, and your level to 1, but adds a counter to your total $(thing)cycles$(). Each counter gives you a significant boost to xp gain for the skill, with more $(thing)cycles$() completed giving you more boosts.
